dcterms:creator: Masaru Tomita
dcterms:description: A dataset based on 7 Tomita grammars, widely used for benchmarking grammatical inference algorithms. The dataset includes strings generated according to specific grammatical rules, with a focus on training RNN models to recognize these patterns.
dcterms:title: Tomita Grammars

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from Dyck grammars, which are a family of context-free languages characterized by balanced parentheses. The dataset includes strings generated according to specific production rules, allowing RNN models to learn and recognize well-balanced structures.
dcterms:title: Dyck Grammars
